meta.title: Voira — AI Call Assistant for Fraud Detection & Scam Protection | 8882 Inc
meta.description: Voira is a real-time conversational AI that answers calls when users don't pick up, detects fraud signals with 92% accuracy, and delivers post-call analytics via WebSocket in under 2 seconds. Zero false positives. Built for telcos and call protection platforms.
meta.keywords: AI call assistant, fraud detection, scam protection, call screening, telco API, real-time analytics, spam filter, voice AI

hero.headline: Voira answers. Fraud doesn't.
hero.subheadline: When users don't pick up, Voira steps in — handling the call with real-time AI, detecting fraud signals, and delivering actionable insights via WebSocket in under 2 seconds.

points.title: Pre-spam filters block real calls.
points.description: Traditional blocking creates frustrating false positives — users miss important calls from banks, doctors, and clients.

points.title: Users are forced to choose blind.
points.description: Answer and risk fraud? Ignore and miss something important? Neither option is good.

points.title: Voira flips the model.
points.description: Users choose to route calls by not answering — zero false positives, full control, and intelligence-powered protection.
